entry_requirements_raw.A-Level:
Minimum Grade BBB or ABC in Biology, Chemistry and Physics / Mathematics.  SPM-level or equivalent:
minimum 5Bs including Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry, Physics
entry_requirements_raw.UEC:
Grade B4 in Biology,Chemistry,Physics and Advanced Mathematics (I) and (II).  SPM-level or equivalent:
minimum 5Bs including Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry, Physics
entry_requirements_raw.Diploma:
Diploma in Health Sciences with minimum CGPA 3.00 and provided the course is not less than 5 semesters or 2.5 years in the same accredited institution.  SPM-level or equivalent:
minimum 5Bs including Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry, Physics
entry_requirements_raw.STPM:
Minimum BBB or ABC in Biology, Chemistry and Physics / Mathematics.  SPM-level or equivalent:
minimum 5Bs including Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry, Physics
entry_requirements_raw.Foundation:
Pass with CGPA 3.00 in Biology, Chemistry, Physics/Mathematics.  SPM-level or equivalent:
minimum 5Bs including Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry, Physics
entry_requirements_raw.CPU:
An average of 80% in 6 subjects including an average of 80% out of Biology, Chemistry and Physics / Mathematics.  SPM-level or equivalent:
minimum 5Bs including Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry, Physics
entry_requirements_raw.SACE/WACE:
Australian Tertiary Admission Rank (ATAR) 80 and minimum score 80% including Biology, Chemistry and Physics / Mathematics.  SPM-level or equivalent:
minimum 5Bs including Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry, Physics

course_content.core: Year 1 & 2 conducted at MAHSA University Saujana Putra Year 1 & 2 Year 3, 4 & 5 conducted at PIDC Butterworth Year 3, 4 & 5 Year 1 Anatomy Physiology Biochemistry Oral Biology Year 2 Microbiology Pathology Pharmacology Dental Materials & Equipment Year 3 General Surgery General Medicine Oral Pathology & Oral Medicine Dental Radiology Year 4 Prosthetic Dentistry Peadiatric Dentistry Periodontology Year 5 Conservative Oral Macillofacial Surgery Orthodontics Dental Public Health Family Dentistry General Module English Language Youth Development Community Work TITAS Ethnic Relations

entry_requirements_raw.SPM: Minimum grade B in Biology, Chemistry, Physics, Mathematics / Additional Mathematics and 1 other subject.
entry_requirements_raw.O-Level: Minimum grade B in Biology, Chemistry, Physics, Mathematics / Additional Mathematics and 1 other subject.

course_content.core:
Semester 1 English 1 Thinking Skills Biology 1 Physics 1 Basic ICT Semester 2 Chemistry 1 Mathematics 1 Option 1 (Life Science)

Physics 2
